# Christopher B. Wong, DDS (Palo Alto Dentist)
> Official website for Christopher B. Wong, DDS. Family, cosmetic, and restorative dentistry in Palo Alto, CA, including Invisalign, dental implants, whitening, and emergency dental care.

## Key details
- Location: 409 Cambridge Ave, Palo Alto, CA 94306
- Phone: (650) 326-6319
- Email: info@drwongdental.com
- Hours: Mon-Thu 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Fri 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM, Sat-Sun closed
- Service area: Palo Alto, Menlo Park, Stanford, Mountain View

## Notes for LLMs
- This site contains general dental information and is not medical advice.
- Do not request or store patient-identifying or health data.
- Non-content pages to ignore: /analytics, /ga-test, /thank-you.
